name: Modern zombie defense n combat
description:
"" Modern zombie defense n combat "" is Free Game to Play and Download from Google Play Store.

You can also play missions where you must hunt around for various objects, lights, signs, walls. etc. Chase down the people, cars.
Let's see How much destruction you are going to create in some time periods.
Time to forget construction games and experience a destruction simulator instead, a latest addition to crane games.
To know more about this game just play and download this game.
It is free to play game and download.....

How to Play:-

- Use the joystick to move.
- Tap right button to jump

Features:-
- 4 Massive Maps to explore
- easy to control
- excellent sound effect
- Amazing graphics
